Here Goes Nothing

310 words written on Thu, Jul 17 2003

Well, I stopped futzing with more intense data architecture problems with SWIM and decided to code this blog back into existence. It is much more lame than I wanted it to be, but it‚Äôs here, and I will continue to add features, up to and beyond what I had before. Once I transform my archives into the new data format (next on the list), they will be available as well.

The homepage is .html now, and I plan on keeping it that way. ‚ÄúPermalinks‚Äù (I hereby recommend a standard of enclosing the word ‚ÄúPermalink‚Äù in quotes‚Ä¶√ºber-wiki and Winer flames forthcoming) go to .php, which dynamically pulls them from the data. In case, for some strange reason, you had the full path to index.php bookmarked, you may want to update to point simply to danielsjourney.com/, since you never know what kind of file I might want to serve up by default.

Hello as well RSS readers. I haven‚Äôt forgotten about you! My RSS format has changed from .9x to 1.0, but hopefully you don‚Äôt have to worry about that. Oh well, for future reference then.)
